mapper.insert: insert into member values(#{id}, #{pass}, #{email}, sysdate, sysdate)
insert into info values(#{id}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{month, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{day, jdbcType=INTEGER},0,0,0,0,0,0)
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and password=#{pass}
select member.*, info.* from member join info on member.id=info.id where member.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set email=#{email} where id=#{id}
update member set email=#{email}, password=#{pass} where id=#{id}
update member set logindate = sysdate where id=#{id}
